entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 60%
